Posts.Content: Hi Warren, I was just trolling around and saw this post. Just something encouraging...My father in law was diagnosed with PC at the age of 70. He just celebrated his 90th bday this past June. He had surgery and some radiation and that was that. Wishing you the best and when you celebrate your 90th, remember my FIL!!
Posts.Title: I may have to ride this train!
